UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile data.

UserRole.title: User Role
UserRole.description: Defines the role of a user, which determines their permissions.

role.description: The assigned role for the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the contact submission.

name.description: Name of the person submitting the form.

email.description: Email address of the person submitting the form.

message.description: The message content from the contact form.

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the contact form was submitted.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile information, readable by the owner and admins.

/roles/{userId}.description: Maps user UIDs to their role. This collection is read-only for clients but writeable by admins.

/contactSubmissions/{contactSubmissionId.description: Stores contact form submissions. Only accessible by admins.
